long_description: Don't let sun or rain interfere with your big plans. Take the Kelty Cabana portable, freestanding shelter to the festival, the beach or the campsite. Features 3 walls to protect from the sun and a floor to keep sand and grass out; front panel zips closed for a little privacy. Shockcorded fiberglass poles make setup fast and easy; polyester walls won't sag or stretch in the rain. Pole sleeves also make setup easy. Side wall mesh windows keep air flowing to help prevent condensation; zip-up panels close over windows for privacy. Internal storage pockets organize small items. Sand bag pouches are included at each corner to aid in staking it down in the sand. Features noiseless zipper pulls; guyout points to secure the shelter in windy conditions. Comes with stakes, guyout cord, pole bag and stuff sack.
short_description: Don't let sun or rain interfere with your big plans. Take the Kelty Cabana portable, freestanding shelter to the festival, the beach or the campsite.
